title: HNB renews long established partnership with Expo Property Developers
body_lines: HNB PLC has renewed its partnership with Expo Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd to present customers with special feature/value additions on properties offered by the real estate giant.

The partnership will be an opportunity for HNB customers to gain access to one of Expo Property Developers exclusive luxury condominiums spread out across the city of Colombo from March. A special ceremony was held at HNB towers to mark the occasion with the presence of HNB Deputy General Manager- Retail and SME Banking, Sanjay Wijemanne and Expo Property Developers Expo Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd Director, Gratien Fernando.

“This is an ideal time for prospective homeowners to invest in the home of their dreams. Our customers have the opportunity of making use of new package and the benefits offered through partnerships with leading real estate developers such as Expo Property Developers to build on their vision for a new home,” HNB Head of Personal Financial Services, Kanchana Karunagama said.

HNB will provide convenient and flexible repayment options tailor-made to their customer’s budget under the partnership with Expo Property Developers, allowing prospective clients access to the 4 towers that extend over 180 perches of land. Tower 1 and 2 consists of 48 and 113 apartments and have been fully completed.
